attributes.additional_details:
The tube trade unions are acting selfishly and choosing to strike on days which will cause the most disruption  for the people in London and the London economy.

It is staggering how much they get paid and what their demands have been (particularly as on the Victoria line the "drivers" no longer drive the trains!)

We have the technology to bring in driverless tubes and many countries adopt this successfully.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor and Greater London Assembly.
